modulesynopsis.name: mod_suexec
modulesynopsis.description: Allows CGI scripts to run as a specified user and Group

summary.p: This module, in combination with the suexec support program allows CGI scripts to run as a specified user and Group.

directivesynopsis.name: SuexecUserGroup
directivesynopsis.description: User and group permissions for CGI programs
directivesynopsis.compatibility: SuexecUserGroup is only available in 2.0 and later.

usage.p: The SuexecUserGroup directive allows you to specify a user and group for CGI programs to run as. Non-CGI requests are still processes with the user specified in the User directive. This directive replaces the Apache 1.3 configuration of using the User and Group directives inside of VirtualHosts.
